definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Pr Pr 15:10 discipline (of the moral nature, chastening, correction;—´[[מ]] Je 2:30 + 31 t. (Ez Eze 5:15 del. Co); cstr. [[מוּסַר]] De 11:2 + 14 t. (for Job 12:28 see [[אסר]]); sf. [[מוּסָרִי]] Pr 8:10; [[מוּסָֽרְְ]] Is 26:16; [[מׂסָרָם]] Job 33:16 (for [[מֻסָרָם]] Di SS);—discipline, correction, of God, De 11:2 ´[[מוּסַר י]] the discipline of ´[[י]] (of Y.'s wonders, as exercising a disciplinary, educating influence upon Israel, cf. Dr); ´[[לקח מ]] Je 17:23, Je 32:33, Je 35:13, Zep 3:2, Zep 3:7; Ps 50:17, Job 33:16, Job 36:10; [[בְּלִמָּתִי]] ´[[מ]] the correction of (i.e. which lead-eth to) my shame Job 20:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[הבלים עֵץ הוּא]] ´[[מ]] the discipline of unreal gods is wood (is like themselves, destitute of true moral force) Je 10:8; Ez Eze 5:15 = warning example (?) Ew Sm (‖[[שְׁמָמָה]]; del. LXX CO).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in Proverbs, discipline in the school of wisdom: ´[[חכמה ומ]] Pr 1:2, Pr 1:7, Pr 23:23; [[חכמה]] ´[[מ]] discipline of wisdom Pr 15:33; [[הַשְׂכֵּל]] ´[[מ]] Pr 1:3; ´[[תוכחות מ]] Pr 6:23; [[לִבְֶָּ]] ´[[הָבִיאָה לַמּ]] Pr 23:12 apply thy mind to discipline; ´[[קבּל מ]] Pr 19:20; ´[[לקח מ]] Pr 1:3, Pr 8:10, Pr 24:32 (cf. Je supr.); [[קנה]] ´[[מ]] Pr 23:23; ´[[שׁמע מ]] Pr 8:23 Pr 19:27; ´[[שׁמר מ]] Pr 10:17; ´[[אהב מ]] Pr 12:1; ´[[החזק במ]] Pr 4:13; the reverse ´[[שׂנא מ]] Pr 5:12; [[פרע]] ´[[מ]] Pr 13:18, Pr 15:32; ´[[בזה מ]] Pr 1:7; ´[[באין מ]] for lack of discipline Pr 5:23 (‖[[בְּרׂב אִיַלְתּוֹ]]); [[אֱוִלִים אִוֶּלֶת]] ´[[מ]] Pr 16:22 the discipline of fools is folly; of paternal discipline, correction, Pr 1:8, Pr 4:1, Pr 13:1.

more severely, chastening, chastisement: a. of God, [[יהוה]] ´[[מ]] Pr 3:11 chastening of Yahweh; [[שׁדַּי]] ´[[מ]] Job 5:17; [[מוּסָֽרְְ]] Is 26:16; [[שְׁלוֹמֵנוּ עָלָיו]] ´[[מ]] Is 53:5 chastisement of (i.e. leading to) our peace was upon him; ´[[לקח מ]] Je 2:30, Je 5:3, Je 7:28; [[אַכְזׇרִי]] ´[[מ]] Je 30:14 chastisement of a cruel one, MT, but rd. ´[[מוּסָר א]] cruel chastisement, Gf and esp. Gie; [[לְכֻלָּם]] ´[[אני מ]] Ho 5:2 I am a chastisement for them all.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man, Pr 15:5, Pr 23:13; ´[[שִׁחֲרוֹ מ]] Pr 13:24; ´[[שֵׁבֶט מ]] Pr 22:15; [[אויל]] ´[[מ]] Pr 7:22 chastisement of a fool; [[מוּסָר רָע]] Pr 15:10 grievous chastisement.
